name: Sendbird
headline: Omnichannel AI Agent Platform for Delightful Customer Service
description: At Sendbird, we are building the AI workforce of tomorrow. Our product is the world's most useful omnichannel AI agent platform for delightful customer service. We power over 300M+ people's conversations every month and we are working with the leading customers such as DoorDash, Match Group, Yahoo!, PayPal, Walgreens, and have raised $220M+ in total funding from ICONIQ, Tiger Global, Meritech, Emergence, SoftBank Vision Fund, Steadfast, Shasta, and August.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:enterprise; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Brandon Jeon, Founder/Head of Trust and Safety
founders.description: Co-founder & Head of Developer Experience and Quality Engineering at Sendbird, the conversations platform for mobile apps.

founders.name: John S. Kim, Co-Founder/CEO
founders.description:
Co-Founder and CEO of SendBird (YC W16), the world's #1 conversations platform for mobile apps with 320M monthly active users. Previous startup Paprika Lab (social gaming) was acquired by GREE. Korea's all-time no.1 pro gaming champion in Unreal Tournament. B.S. computer science. Engineer who likes brain, space, complexity.

• Personal website: https://positivetenacity.com
• IG: https://www.instagram.com/dosh

## The **AI workforce** humans can lean on.Never tires, never quits, and **always improves**.Scale to meet **any demand**.
### The one AI agent platform that adapts to you, not the other way around.
Deliver customer support on any channel. Integrate with your support software.
[View AI agent platform](https://sendbird.com/</ai-agent>)
Omnichannel AI agent engine, powered by Sendbird Your support software
### Everywhere your customers are, before they even ask.
Boost resolution rates and reduce response times with AI customer service agents designed for omnichannel support.
1 Anywhere 
##### Anywhere, anytime AI agent
Support customers 24/7 with AI customer service agents that deliver instant support—on mobile, web, social media, SMS, or email.
2 Continuous 
##### Never lose a thread
Let your AI customer service agent pick up the conversation exactly where your customer left off, on any channel.
3 Proactive 
##### Proactively engage your customers
Reach your customers before they reach you. Our AI agents anticipates needs and proactively initiates conversations on your customers' preferred channels.
4 Unified 
##### Say goodbye to fragmented insights
Connect the dots with a 360° view of your customer. Turn omnichannel conversations into unified customer insights to inform smarter business decisions.
  1. Anywhere 
  2. Continuous 
  3. Proactive 
  4. Unified 


![Anywhere, anytime AI agent](https://sendbird.sfo3.digitaloceanspaces.com/cms/Anywhere-logo.svg)
##### Anywhere, anytime AI agent
Support customers 24/7 with AI customer service agents that deliver instant support—on mobile, web, social media, SMS, or email.
### Command your AI agents from one hub.
Build, test, and evaluate your AI workforce—all from one intuitive control center.
[View AI agent builder](https://sendbird.com/</ai-agent/builder>)
### Connecting the world. 6 billion users and counting.
![Planetbg12](https://sendbird.imgix.net/cms/planetbg12_2025-02-13-104950_unru.webp?auto=format,compress&crop=faces&w=744)

### Transparent AI on a secure platform.
Confidently adopt AI with a platform that meets the highest standards of security, privacy, and compliance.
![Data governance 1](https://sendbird.imgix.net/cms/Data-governance-1_2025-02-13-231525_xjsq.png?auto=format,compress&crop=faces&w=1000)
Secure integration
Ensure every connection to your website, mobile apps and system of records, complies with your policies and security standards to safeguard sensitive data.
![Data governance 1](https://sendbird.imgix.net/cms/Data-governance-1_2025-02-13-231525_xjsq.png?auto=format,compress&crop=faces)
Transparent AI auditing
Gain full visibility into your AI agent's decision-making and performance. Monitor, audit, and refine to align with your business standards.
![Tranparent AI auditing](https://sendbird.imgix.net/cms/Tranparent-AI-auditing_2025-02-13-231526_dxrs.png?auto=format,compress&crop=faces)
Data governance
Your data remains yours. We never access, use, or share it, ensuring full compliance with your governance policies.
![Data governance](https://sendbird.imgix.net/cms/Data-governance_2025-02-13-231525_xtgk.png?auto=format,compress&crop=faces)
Privacy & security
Built with PII protection in mind, using encryption, data masking, and region-specific storage—all backed by TLS 1.3 transport security.
![Privacy security](https://sendbird.imgix.net/cms/Privacy-security_2025-02-13-231526_moap.png?auto=format,compress&crop=faces)
### Enterprise support you deserve.
Our team combines years of expertise in AI, machine learning, prompt engineering, chat, and system integrations to help you design and deploy your AI agents with confidence.
![Frame 1000008902 2](https://sendbird.imgix.net/cms/Frame-1000008902-2.png?auto=format,compress&crop=faces)
#####  Professional services 
Benefit from our forward deployment team's expertise to meet your AI needs. 
![Pexels rdne 9034704 2](https://sendbird.imgix.net/cms/pexels-rdne-9034704-2.png?auto=format,compress&crop=faces)
#####  Global customer success 
Receive dedicated support from onboarding to renewal, access to best practices. 
![Pexels cottonbro 5076522 3](https://sendbird.imgix.net/cms/pexels-cottonbro-5076522-3.png?auto=format,compress&crop=faces)
#####  24/7 technical support 
Get the help you need, when you need it on digital channels or in-person. 
![Tailored SLA plans](https://sendbird.imgix.net/cms/Tailored-SLA-plans_2025-01-22-094329_izva.png?auto=format,compress&crop=faces)

## The **AI workforce** humans can lean on.Never tires, never quits, and **always improves**.Scale to meet **any demand**.
### The one AI agent platform that adapts to you, not the other way around.
Deliver customer support on any channel. Integrate with your support software.
View AI agent platform⟨27⟩
Omnichannel AI agent engine, powered by Sendbird Your support software
### Everywhere your customers are, before they even ask.
Boost resolution rates and reduce response times with AI customer service agents designed for omnichannel support.
1 Anywhere 
##### Anywhere, anytime AI agent
Support customers 24/7 with AI customer service agents that deliver instant support—on mobile, web, social media, SMS, or email.
2 Continuous 
##### Never lose a thread
Let your AI customer service agent pick up the conversation exactly where your customer left off, on any channel.
3 Proactive 
##### Proactively engage your customers
Reach your customers before they reach you. Our AI agents anticipates needs and proactively initiates conversations on your customers' preferred channels.
4 Unified 
##### Say goodbye to fragmented insights
Connect the dots with a 360° view of your customer. Turn omnichannel conversations into unified customer insights to inform smarter business decisions.
  1. Anywhere 
  2. Continuous 
  3. Proactive 
  4. Unified 


![Anywhere, anytime AI agent⟨28⟩]
##### Anywhere, anytime AI agent
Support customers 24/7 with AI customer service agents that deliver instant support—on mobile, web, social media, SMS, or email.
### Command your AI agents from one hub.
Build, test, and evaluate your AI workforce—all from one intuitive control center.

### Transparent AI on a secure platform.
Confidently adopt AI with a platform that meets the highest standards of security, privacy, and compliance.
![Data governance 1⟨45⟩]
Secure integration
Ensure every connection to your website, mobile apps and system of records, complies with your policies and security standards to safeguard sensitive data.
![Data governance 1⟨46⟩]
Transparent AI auditing
Gain full visibility into your AI agent's decision-making and performance. Monitor, audit, and refine to align with your business standards.
![Tranparent AI auditing⟨47⟩]
Data governance
Your data remains yours. We never access, use, or share it, ensuring full compliance with your governance policies.
![Data governance⟨48⟩]
Privacy & security
Built with PII protection in mind, using encryption, data masking, and region-specific storage—all backed by TLS 1.3 transport security.
![Privacy security⟨49⟩]

Our team combines years of expertise in AI, machine learning, prompt engineering, chat, and system integrations to help you design and deploy your AI agents with confidence.

generated_description:
### Sendbird: Transforming Customer Service with AI

Founded in **2013**, Sendbird hails from San Mateo, California, and kicked off its journey in the esteemed Y Combinator Batch W16. What sets Sendbird apart is its mission: to build an **Omnichannel AI Agent Platform for Delightful Customer Service**. Simply put, they aim to revolutionize how businesses interact with customers by leveraging cutting-edge AI technology.

### The Impact
Every month, Sendbird facilitates over **300 million** conversations, seamlessly connecting businesses with their customers across various channels. Notable clients include industry giants like **DoorDash, Yahoo!, PayPal,** and **Walgreens**, making it a trusted partner for customer engagement.

### Funding and Growth
To support its ambitious goals, Sendbird has attracted over **$220 million** in funding from high-profile investors such as SoftBank Vision Fund, Tiger Global, and ICONIQ Capital. With a nimble team of 300 employees, Sendbird's growth trajectory is nothing short of impressive.

### What They Offer
Sendbird specializes in creating an **AI workforce** that is intelligent, proactive, and always improving. Here’s a snapshot of what their platform brings to the table:
- **Omnichannel Support**: Whether it’s mobile, social media, or email, Sendbird’s AI agents operate seamlessly across platforms.
- **Continuous Conversations**: Customers can switch channels without losing the context, thanks to Sendbird’s smart conversation management.
- **Proactive Engagement**: The AI can anticipate customer needs and initiate conversations, enhancing user experience.
- **Unified Insights**: Sendbird provides businesses with a complete view of customer interactions, enabling data-driven decisions.

### Security First
In a world where data privacy is paramount, Sendbird emphasizes a secure platform built around stringent **privacy and compliance** measures. They ensure that customer data remains protected and confidential while integrating smoothly with existing systems.

### Support and Resources
Sendbird doesn't just stop at providing an AI platform; they also offer extensive support throughout the deployment process and beyond, ensuring that businesses can leverage AI effectively. Their focus on transparency means that companies can monitor and refine their AI agents to align with business goals.

### Ready to Engage?
If you’re interested in transforming your customer service experience with AI, Sendbird is eager to help. To learn more about their solutions or to get started, check out their website: [Sendbird](https://sendbird.com).

---

Sendbird isn’t just riding the AI wave; they're helping companies navigate through it with finesse. With a commitment to delightful service enabled by technology, they are undoubtedly paving the way for the future of customer interactions.
